00066 static const double ARQuaternionEpsilon = 1.e-6;

00077 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionMakeWithCoordinates(double w, double x, double y, double z) {
00078         ARQuaternion result = {
00079                 w,
00080                 x,
00081                 y,
00082                 z
00083         };
00084         return result;
00085 }
00086 
00094 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionMakeWithTransform(ARTransform3D transform) {
00095         // http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/geometry/rotations/conversions/matrixToQuaternion/index.htm (Alternative Method)
00096         ARQuaternion result;
00097         result.w = sqrt(ARMax(0., 1. + transform.m11 + transform.m22 + transform.m33)) / 2.;
00098         result.x = sqrt(ARMax(0., 1. + transform.m11 - transform.m22 - transform.m33)) / 2.;
00099         result.y = sqrt(ARMax(0., 1. - transform.m11 + transform.m22 - transform.m33)) / 2.;
00100         result.z = sqrt(ARMax(0., 1. - transform.m11 - transform.m22 + transform.m33)) / 2.;
00101         result.x = copysign(result.x, transform.m32 - transform.m23);
00102         result.y = copysign(result.y, transform.m13 - transform.m31);
00103         result.z = copysign(result.z, transform.m21 - transform.m12);
00104         return result;
00105 }
00106 
00112 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionMakeWithPoint(ARPoint3D p) {
00113         ARQuaternion result = {
00114                 0,
00115                 p.x,
00116                 p.y,
00117                 p.z
00118         };
00119         return result;
00120 }

00129 static inline double ARQuaternionGetCoordinate(ARQuaternion quaternion, ARQuaternionCoordinateId coordinateId) {
00130         NSCAssert(coordinateId >= 0 && coordinateId <= ARQuaternionCoordinateCount, @"Invalid coordinate id.");
00131         
00132         return ((double *)&quaternion)[coordinateId];
00133 }

00142 static inline void ARQuaternionSetCoordinate(ARQuaternion *quaternion, ARQuaternionCoordinateId coordinateId, double value) {
00143         NSCAssert(coordinateId >= 0 && coordinateId <= ARQuaternionCoordinateCount, @"Invalid coordinate id.");
00144         
00145         ((double *)quaternion)[coordinateId] = value;
00146 }

00154 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionNegate(ARQuaternion q) {
00155         ARQuaternion result = {
00156                 -q.w,
00157                 -q.x,
00158                 -q.y,
00159                 -q.z
00160         };
00161         return result;
00162 }

00170 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionConjugate(ARQuaternion q) {
00171         ARQuaternion result = {
00172                 q.w,
00173                 -q.x,
00174                 -q.y,
00175                 -q.z
00176         };
00177         return result;
00178 }

00186 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionAdd(ARQuaternion a, ARQuaternion b) {
00187         ARQuaternion result = {
00188                 a.w + b.w,
00189                 a.x + b.x,
00190                 a.y + b.y,
00191                 a.z + b.z,
00192         };
00193         return result;
00194 }
00195 
00202 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionSubtract(ARQuaternion a, ARQuaternion b) {
00203         ARQuaternion result = {
00204                 a.w - b.w,
00205                 a.x - b.x,
00206                 a.y - b.y,
00207                 a.z - b.z,
00208         };
00209         return result;
00210 }
00211 
00218 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionMultiply(ARQuaternion a, ARQuaternion b) {
00219         ARQuaternion result = {
00220                 a.w*b.w - a.x*b.x - a.y*b.y - a.z*b.z,
00221                 a.w*b.x + a.x*b.w + a.y*b.z - a.z*b.y,
00222                 a.w*b.y - a.x*b.z + a.y*b.w + a.z*b.x,
00223                 a.w*b.z + a.x*b.y - a.y*b.x + a.z*b.w
00224         };
00225         return result;
00226 }
00227 
00234 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionMultiplyByScalar(ARQuaternion q, double s) {
00235         ARQuaternion result = {
00236                 q.w * s,
00237                 q.x * s,
00238                 q.y * s,
00239                 q.z * s
00240         };
00241         return result;
00242 }

00249 static inline double ARQuaternionElementsMaxAbs(ARQuaternion quaternion) {
00250         double result = ARMax(ARMax(fabs(quaternion.w), fabs(quaternion.x)), ARMax(fabs(quaternion.y), fabs(quaternion.z)));
00251         return result;
00252 }
00253 
00260 static inline double ARQuaternionDotProduct(ARQuaternion a, ARQuaternion b) {
00261         double result = a.w * b.w + a.x * b.x + a.y * b.y + a.z * b.z;
00262         return result;
00263 }
00264 
00271 static inline BOOL ARQuaternionEquals(ARQuaternion a, ARQuaternion b) {
00272         BOOL result =
00273                 a.w == b.w &&
00274                 a.x == b.x &&
00275                 a.y == b.y &&
00276                 a.z == b.z;
00277         return result;
00278 }
00279 
00293 static inline BOOL ARQuaternionEqualsWithAccuracy(ARQuaternion a, ARQuaternion b, double accuracy) {
00294         if (ARQuaternionDotProduct(a, b) < 0) {
00295                 b = ARQuaternionNegate(b);
00296         }
00297         ARQuaternion difference = ARQuaternionSubtract(a, b);
00298         BOOL result =
00299                 fabs(difference.w) <= accuracy &&
00300                 fabs(difference.x) <= accuracy &&
00301                 fabs(difference.y) <= accuracy &&
00302                 fabs(difference.z) <= accuracy;
00303         return result;
00304 }
00305 
00311 static inline double ARQuaternionNorm(ARQuaternion q) {
00312         double result = sqrt(q.w*q.w + q.x*q.x + q.y*q.y + q.z*q.z);
00313         return result;
00314 }
00315 
00323 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionNormalize(ARQuaternion q) {
00324         ARQuaternion result;
00325         double norm = ARQuaternionNorm(q);
00326         if (norm <= ARQuaternionEpsilon) {
00327                 result = ARQuaternionIdentity;
00328         } else {
00329                 result = ARQuaternionMultiplyByScalar(q, 1. / norm);
00330         }
00331         return result;
00332 }
00333 
00344 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionSLERP(ARQuaternion a, ARQuaternion b, double t) {
00345         // http://www.euclideanspace.com/maths/algebra/realNormedAlgebra/quaternions/slerp/index.htm
00346         ARQuaternion result;
00347         
00348         // Calculate angle between the quaternions
00349         double cosAngle = ARQuaternionDotProduct(a, b);
00350         if (cosAngle < 0) {
00351                 b = ARQuaternionNegate(b);
00352                 cosAngle = -cosAngle;
00353         }
00354         
00355         // if qa=qb or qa=-qb then theta = 0 and we can return qa
00356         if (fabs(cosAngle) >= 1. - ARQuaternionEpsilon) {
00357                 result = a;
00358         } else {
00359                 double angle = acos(cosAngle);
00360                 double sinAngle = sin(angle);
00361                 double ratioA = sin((1. - t) * angle) / sinAngle;
00362                 double ratioB = sin(t * angle) / sinAngle;
00363                 result = ARQuaternionAdd(ARQuaternionMultiplyByScalar(a, ratioA), ARQuaternionMultiplyByScalar(b, ratioB));
00364                 result = ARQuaternionNormalize(result);
00365         }
00366         return result;
00367 }
00368 
00379 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionNLERP(ARQuaternion a, ARQuaternion b, double t) {
00380         // http://www.allegro.cc/forums/thread/599059
00381         ARQuaternion result;
00382         
00383         if (ARQuaternionDotProduct(a, b) < 0) {
00384                 b = ARQuaternionNegate(b);
00385         }
00386         
00387         result = ARQuaternionAdd(ARQuaternionMultiplyByScalar(a, 1. - t), ARQuaternionMultiplyByScalar(b, t));
00388         result = ARQuaternionNormalize(result);
00389         return result;
00390 }
00391 
00398 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionTransformPointQuaternion(ARQuaternion q, ARQuaternion p) {
00399         ARQuaternion result = ARQuaternionMultiply(ARQuaternionMultiply(ARQuaternionConjugate(q), p), q);
00400         return result;
00401 }
00402 
00409 static inline ARPoint3D ARQuaternionTransformPoint(ARQuaternion q, ARPoint3D p) {
00410         ARQuaternion result = ARQuaternionTransformPointQuaternion(q, ARQuaternionMakeWithPoint(p));
00411         return ARPoint3DMake(result.x, result.y, result.z);
00412 }
00413 
00420 static inline CATransform3D ARQuaternionConvertToMatrix(ARQuaternion q) {
00421         CATransform3D result = {
00422                 // Row 1
00423                 q.w*q.w + q.x*q.x - q.y*q.y - q.z*q.z,
00424                 2 * (q.x*q.y - q.w*q.z),
00425                 2 * (q.x*q.z + q.w*q.y),
00426                 0,
00427                 
00428                 // Row 2
00429                 2 * (q.x*q.y + q.w*q.z),
00430                 q.w*q.w - q.x*q.x + q.y*q.y - q.z*q.z,
00431                 2 * (q.y*q.z - q.w*q.x),
00432                 0,
00433                 
00434                 // Row 3
00435                 2 * (q.x*q.z - q.w*q.y),
00436                 2 * (q.y*q.z + q.w*q.x),
00437                 q.w*q.w - q.x*q.x - q.y*q.y + q.z*q.z,
00438                 0,
00439                 
00440                 // Row 4
00441                 0,
00442                 0,
00443                 0,
00444                 q.w*q.w + q.x*q.x + q.y*q.y + q.z*q.z
00445         };
00446         return result;
00447 }
00448 
00454 static inline ARPoint3D ARQuaternionConvertToPoint(ARQuaternion quaternion) {
00455         ARPoint3D result = {quaternion.x, quaternion.y, quaternion.z};
00456         return result;
00457 }
00458 
00467 static inline ARQuaternion ARQuaternionRotateInDirection(ARQuaternion x, ARQuaternion dir)
00468 {
00469         NSCAssert(fabs(ARQuaternionDotProduct(x, dir)) < ARQuaternionEpsilon, @"Input vectors should be perpendicular.");
00470         double theta = ARQuaternionNorm(dir);
00471         if (theta == 0.) {
00472                 return x;
00473         } else {
00474                 double costheta = cos(theta);
00475                 double sintheta = sin(theta);
00476                 ARQuaternion dirUnit = ARQuaternionMultiplyByScalar(dir, 1./theta);
00477                 x = ARQuaternionAdd(ARQuaternionMultiplyByScalar(x, costheta), ARQuaternionMultiplyByScalar(dirUnit, sintheta));
00478                 NSCAssert(fabs(ARQuaternionNorm(x) - 1.) < ARQuaternionEpsilon, @"Output vector should be normalized.");
00479                 return x;
00480         }
00481 }
